home.title: DAREHIVE
home.subtitle: The video challenge revolution is here! Join the hive, create viral content and climb to the top of the leaderboard!
home.ctaSubtitle: Download DareHive now and start your adventure in the most fun video challenge universe!
home.androidNote: ⚡ Android version in development - Join our waiting list for future Amazon rewards!

videoChallenges.title: Immersive Video Challenges
videoChallenges.description: Take on creative challenges, film your most authentic reactions and share your talent with the DareHive community!

ranking.title: Ranking System & Rewards
ranking.description: Earn XP points, climb the ranks and become a legend! The most active users receive exclusive badges and very soon Amazon gift cards!

viral.title: Viral Content
viral.description: Go viral! Our challenges are designed to generate authentic and engaging content that rocks on social media.

community.title: Active Community
community.description: Join a community of passionate creators! Discover, like and share the best videos from the hive.

aiChallenges.title: Personalized Challenges (coming soon)
aiChallenges.description: Smart algorithm in development that will adapt to your tastes! Soon custom challenges that match your personality.

amazonRewards.title: Amazon Rewards (very soon)
amazonRewards.description: Unlock rare badges, prestigious titles and very soon Amazon gift cards for the best creators!

features.title: ⚡ DareHive Features
features.subtitle: Discover all the power of the next-generation video challenge app

studio.title: 🎬 Integrated Creation Studio
studio.description: Intuitive interface inspired by TikTok to film, edit and share your challenges in seconds.

social.title: 🚀 Smart Social Feed
social.description: Advanced algorithm that offers you the most engaging content from the DareHive community.

gamification.title: 🏆 Progression System & Amazon Rewards
gamification.description: Climb the ranks, unlock exclusive rewards and become a DareHive legend! Monthly rankings with reset.

ai.title: 🧠 Advanced Artificial Intelligence (in development)
ai.description: Our AI is being developed to adapt to your preferences and offer you the most personalized experience possible.
items: 🎯 Personalized challenges based on your tastes (soon)

performance.title: Ultra-Fast Performance
performance.description: Optimized architecture for instant loading and smooth navigation. We work every day to optimize the experience.

security.title: Enhanced Security
security.description: End-to-end encryption and advanced protection of your personal data.

native.title: Native iOS Interface
native.description: Design perfectly integrated with Apple standards for a premium experience.

cloud.title: Cloud Synchronization
cloud.description: Your creations automatically saved and accessible everywhere.

community.title: Global Community
community.description: Connect with creators from around the world and discover new talents.

rewards.title: Amazon Rewards (very soon)
rewards.description: The most active and talented creators will very soon receive Amazon gift cards!

features.ctaSubtitle: Download DareHive now and discover all these revolutionary features! The most active will soon receive Amazon vouchers!

contact.title: 📞 Contact Us
contact.subtitle: A question, a suggestion or need help? We're here for you!

form.title: 💬 Send us a message
form.name: Full name
form.subject: Subject
form.messagePlaceholder: Tell us everything! The more details you give, the better we can help you 😊

response.title: 🕒 Average response time?
response.answer: We usually respond within 24 hours! For urgent matters, use the priority support email.

amazon.title: 🎁 How to receive Amazon vouchers?
amazon.answer: The most active creators who accumulate the most points receive special rewards! Stay connected to not miss anything.

bug.title: 🐛 How to report a bug?
bug.answer: Use the form above by selecting "Report a bug". Don't forget to describe the steps to reproduce the problem!

feature.title: 💡 Suggest a new feature?
feature.answer: We love good ideas! Send us your detailed suggestion, we study each proposal carefully.

footer.description: The video challenge revolution is underway! Join the hive and go viral to win Amazon rewards.
footer.status: 🚀 iOS version available!\n📱 Android in development\n🎁 Amazon rewards for the most active
footer.copyright: Created with passion for the creator community

terms.title: 📋 Terms of Service
terms.subtitle: The rules of the game for a top DareHive experience!
terms.ctaSubtitle: These terms are here so everyone can have fun safely on DareHive!

privacy.title: 🔒 Privacy Policy
privacy.subtitle: Your data is precious, we protect it like a treasure!

encryption.title: End-to-End Encryption
encryption.description: Your private messages and sensitive data are encrypted with the same technologies as banks.

noSelling.title: Zero Data Selling
noSelling.description: Your data is never sold to third parties. Our business model relies on premium features.

instantDeletion.title: Instant Deletion
instantDeletion.description: You can delete your account and all your data with one click. Effective deletion within 24 hours maximum.

privacy.ctaSubtitle: Join DareHive with confidence, your privacy is in good hands.
